column4: does anyone know a tutorial to make a quick .deb package for install?
type 'top' without the '' in the command line
so either allow it to finish indexing or set it to not start up with ubuntu
will this index everytime i start? or once and stop bothering me?
the first time it has to index all of your files-although you can adjust that to index only certain directories or omit ones
afterwards it only has to update the files that have been removed/added
it has started before as it comes enabled by default in ubuntu
updatedb I believe is for slocate
I prefer the find command for the odd time I need to search for something
can  i upload that file to a shell and somehow make it posible for justin to dl it?
use dcc with you irc client
